short_summary: Replacement of the Kennington Cove Freshwater Brook Bridge
description: Parks Canada requires a contractor to provide construction services related to the replacement of the Kennington Cove Freshwater Brook Bridge.  Work includes supply of all materials, labour, equipment and ancillaries, raising the grade of the existing road and constructing precast retaining block wingwalls. Work to start on or before September 5, 2023 and achieve Substantial Performance of the Work by November 3, 2023.
full_summary:
# Stage 1 - Fortress of Louisbourg - Replacement of the Kennington Cove Bridge

## Tender Details

* **Title (English)**: Stage 1 - Fortress of Louisbourg - Replacement of the Kennington Cove Bridge
* **Title (French)**: Phase 1 - Forteresse de Louisbourg - Remplacement du pont de Kennington Cove
* **Reference Number**: CB-7217-49831155
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0104/A-001
* **Publication Date**: July 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 25, 2023 13:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: July 25, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: November 3, 2023

## Tender Information

* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expired
* **Goods/Service Code (UNSpsc)**: 72141107 - Bridge Construction and Repair Service
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Notice Type (English)**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice Type (French)**: Request for Proposals
* **Procurement Method (English)**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Procurement Method (French)**: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif

## Description

Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to replace the Kennington Cove Freshwater Brook Bridge, a triple barrel timber culvert with a concrete slab bottom. The proposed structure will be a precast concrete rigid frame bridge with concrete footings. Work will include:

* Raising the grade of the existing road
* Constructing precast retaining block wingwalls
* Supplying all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillaries

The site is located along Kennington Cove Road, approximately 2 km east of the intersection with the Park's service road, at the Fortress of Louisbourg, Nova Scotia. The existing bridge crosses over a freshwater brook and consists of a single-lane structure, constructed upon two abutments and two intermediate foundations, and measuring approximately 4 m long.

The work is expected to start on or before September 5, 2023, and achieve substantial performance by November 3, 202
